Name: SQL - Create Database Using SMO (only if does not exists)
Description: This uses Sql Management Objects to create a database.  If the username and password are both empty then it will attempt a trusted connection using integrated security.

Parameters.Name: SqlUsername
Parameters.Label: Sql Username (optional)
Parameters.HelpText: The SQL Account which has access to Create SQL Database

Parameters.Name: SqlPassword
Parameters.Label: Sql Password (optional)
Parameters.HelpText: The password for the SQL Account

Parameters.Name: SqlDatabase
Parameters.Label: Sql Database
Parameters.HelpText: Name of Database to be created if not already there
